module: The seven_seg_5 module maps a 4-bit input 'char' to a 7-bit output 'segs' to control a seven-segment display, showcasing numerals 0-8 or turning off for other values. It utilizes an always block with a case statement to update the 'segs' register, which directly represents segment activation on the display, ensuring straightforward decoding of numerical input to visual output.
